Reference a figure, table, or equation (or other list elements!)

Source: R/NMFSReports.R
crossref.Rd

Reference a figure, table, or equation (or other list elements!)

crossref(list_obj, nickname, sublist = "number")

Arguments

list_obj

A list object created by list_figures or list_tables.
nickname

A unique string that is used to identify the plot or table in list_figures or list_tables, respectively.
sublist

A string of the sublist in list_figures or list_tables you want the contents returned from.

Value

The item in the list.

Examples

list_figures <- c()
pp <- plot(x = 1, y = 1)

list_figures <- NMFSReports::save_figures(
   figure = pp,
   list_figures = list_figures,
   header = "blah blah blah",
   nickname = "example_figure", # a unique name you can refer back to
   cnt_chapt_content = "003",
   cnt = "012")
list_figures <- NMFSReports::save_figures(
   figure = pp,
   list_figures = list_figures,
   header = "blah blah blah",
   nickname = "example_figure_other", # a unique name you can refer back to
   cnt_chapt_content = "003",
   cnt = "013")
list_figures
#> $example_figure
#> $example_figure$figure
#> NULL
#> 
#> $example_figure$raw
#> NULL
#> 
#> $example_figure$caption
#> [1] "Figure 012. blah blah blah."
#> 
#> $example_figure$header
#> [1] "Figure 012. blah blah blah."
#> 
#> $example_figure$nickname
#> [1] "example_figure"
#> 
#> $example_figure$alttext
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $example_figure$number
#> [1] "012"
#> 
#> $example_figure$footnote
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $example_figure$filename
#> [1] "x003_fig_012"
#> 
#> 
#> $example_figure_other
#> $example_figure_other$figure
#> NULL
#> 
#> $example_figure_other$raw
#> NULL
#> 
#> $example_figure_other$caption
#> [1] "Figure 013. blah blah blah."
#> 
#> $example_figure_other$header
#> [1] "Figure 013. blah blah blah."
#> 
#> $example_figure_other$nickname
#> [1] "example_figure_other"
#> 
#> $example_figure_other$alttext
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $example_figure_other$number
#> [1] "013"
#> 
#> $example_figure_other$footnote
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $example_figure_other$filename
#> [1] "x003_fig_013"
#> 
#> 
refnum <- NMFSReports::crossref(
   list_obj = list_figures,
   nickname = "example_figure",
   sublist = "number")
refnum
#> [1] "012"
print(paste0("Please refer to figure ", refnum,
             " to see this figure, not the other figure."))
#> [1] "Please refer to figure 012 to see this figure, not the other figure."
